privacy.metaDescription: Information about SK Production’s privacy policy and the protection of personal data.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

sections.title: 1. General Information
paragraphs: At SK Production, protecting the privacy of our visitors and users is important to us. This privacy policy explains how the information we collect is used when you visit our website or use our services.

sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
paragraphs: We may collect the following information on our website:
list: Personal information you provide via the contact form such as name, email, and phone number
Website usage data (IP address, browser type, pages visited)

sections.title: 3. Use of Information
paragraphs: The information we collect may be used for the following purposes:
list: To provide and improve our services
To respond to your contact requests

sections.title: 4. Cookies
paragraphs: Our website uses cookies to improve the user experience. Cookies are small text files stored in your browser when you visit a website. You can manage cookies via your browser settings.

sections.title: 5. Data Security
paragraphs: We take appropriate technical and administrative measures to ensure the security of your personal data. However, data transmission over the internet cannot be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

sections.title: 6. Your Rights
paragraphs: You have the following rights regarding the processing of your personal data:
list: To learn whether your personal data is processed
To request information about your processed personal data
To request deletion or destruction of your personal data
To object to outcomes produced solely by automated systems that may be to your detriment

sections.title: 7. Contact
paragraphs: If you have questions about our privacy policy, you can contact us:
Email: info@skpro.com.tr • Phone: +90 532 123 4567 • Address: Zincirlidere Caddesi No:52/C Şişli/İstanbul

sections.title: 4. Services
